title: DRDO CEPTAM Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 764 Senior Technical Assistant, Technician Posts
description: The DRDO Centre for Personnel Talent Management (DRDO CEPTAM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 764 Senior Technical Assistant -B, Technician-A Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech, 10th, ITI can apply for the DRDO CEPTAM Jobs 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the ed...
